Hello,

after crawling 8.5 million pages with the 
BroadScope/BdbFrontier/C=
achedBdbBigMap setup I mentioned in my mails before, 
Heritrix' web server =
is not crawling and not responding for more than 24 
hours

I can connect t=
o Jetty with "telnet localhost 8080", but do not get any 
response. The "st=
ate.job" file still says "RUNNING", and there are no obvious 
RuntimeExcept=
ions, OOME's etc. in the logs.

I think it has something to do with heap me=
mory, since it's full (100% of the 
permitted 1 GB heap), but shouldn't the=
n Java throw an OOME at some point?
However, it appeared to happily run wit=
h 1GB heap usage for several days (see 
some progess-statistics.log at the =
end of this mail)

Unfortunately, I cannot diagnose further with JVM 1.4 (n=
o JMX or jmap). 
Perhaps you know what's wrong or what I should do next.

A=
ll the best,

Christian

Snippets from progress-statistics.log:
(Note: I ha=
ve increased the number of ToeThreads in between from 50 to 70).
